message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you, potentially even more than its current market value. I'm not at liberty to disclose the specifics just yet, but I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. If you're interested, please let me know and we can discuss the details further. If not, I'll be selling it to another buyer for $800000.
